content: were made on your pokéball step 1 cut out a 75 diameter circle from the white basic felt and a 1 diameter circle from weave in all ends the black basic felt abbreviations step 2 now center and sew the white circle onto the black circle with sewing needle and chain = chain thread tie a knot onto the back of the circles single_crochet = single_crochet and cut the thread st = stitch step 3 finally center and sew the black sts = stitches portion of the pokéball button onto the single_crochet decrease = single_crochet decrease opposite side of where the color changes repeat = repeat were made on your pokéball tie a knot r = round underneath the pokéball button and cut the thread notes crochet button instructions color change- while performing the last single_crochet of the round yarn over with with color b and f hook use the adjustable current color insert hook into next st yarn ring method working 6sc into the ring place over draw yarn through st you now have two marker in last single_crochet worked then start working in loops on your hook drop current color and the round pick up new color yarn over with new color and draw yarn through two loops on your r1 2sc in each st around to marker 12 hook cut previous color and continue working with new color cut your yarn leaving a 6 tail with color c and f hook use the adjustable felt cut out outlines ring method working 6sc into the ring cut your yarn leaving a 6 tail center and whipstitch with 6 tail of color c 75 the 6sc circle made with color c to the 12sc circle made with color b then center and whipstitch with 6 tail of 1 color b the 12sc circle made with color b to thank you for downloading this free pattern find more free patterns from cosmic thread on ravelry com pokéball © cosmic thread 2014 updated 2021
